scripts.schema-modules: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/Hksoft-code/railkafeschema.git && mkdir -p src/models && mv railkafeschema/src/models/* src/models && mkdir -p src/config && mv railkafeschema/src/config/* src/config/ && mv railkafeschema/src/services/sequelizeHooks/* src/services/sequelizeHooks/&& rm -rf railkafeschema/
scripts.schema-modules-window: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/Hksoft-code/railkafeschema.git && mkdir src\models && move railkafeschema\src\models\* src\models && mkdir src\config && move railkafeschema\src\config\* src\config && move railkafeschema\src\services\sequelizeHooks\* src\services\sequelizeHooks\ && rd /s /q railkafeschema\
